beantype.name: org.rapidbeans.rapidenv.config.cmd.CmdCondStderr
beantype.description: Defines a condition on the standard error contents at the end of the system command execution.

property.name: equals
property.description: The standard error output has be exactly the specified (maybe multi lined) value.

property.name: matches
property.description: The standard error output has to match the specified pattern (Java regular expression) from begin to end.

property.name: contains
property.description: The standard error output must contain the specified string.

property.name: containsmatch
property.description: The standard error output has to match the specified pattern (Java regular expression).
